typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'rest',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'singleDocument']) ~> sapeccrest
sapeccrest sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
